data.title: Best Burgers!!
data.text: I have always enjoyed the food here. We have eaten in and order out. Both ways are always good. I have also been here with large groups and they do a great job .

data.title: Good Burgers
data.text: I love how fresh their buns and their meat is. They always make their buns fresh there at the restaurant

data.title: Still good after all the years
data.text: My family has been coming to Fuddrucker's for decades. When we were traveling in CA, we were looking for a place for lunch. Saw Fuddrucker's and decided to stop in. Still great food! My husband had the Chipotle Bison Burger and it was really good. Not spicy, just a nice smoky flavor and really juicy. The service was fast and the restaurant was clean. Glad Fuddruckers is still as good as it used to be!

data.title: Very good menu & soda variety. Fresh topping bar.
data.text:
Right in the Main Street of an old style city. 
I liked the variety of the menu & soda dispenser (multiple flavors). It has a Fresh vegetable topping bar + Melted American cheese available for your hamburger and fries. Clean restaurant and child friendly. 
I ordered the Kobe beef hamburger and it was an excellent choice. I just think the 'make it a combo' price is a bit high ($3.79). Overall I paid aprox. $11.70 + tax for a specialty burger combo (Kobe add $2.10 more).

data.title: Great Burgers, fries and fun atmosphere!
data.text: Fuddrucker has great burgers and you can get bison and sometimes ostrich. They have regular and sweet potato fries which are really good. You get to put your own toppings on your burger so you really get it anyway you want it. Fun atmosphere.

data.title: Great burgers!
data.text: I have been coming to this place for years!  it's never stopped serving juicy hamburgers!  enough for two!  don't forget your doggy bag! LOL

data.title: Great Burgers
data.text: This restaurant offers a wide variety of traditional and specialty burgers cooked to order. They also offer more "exotic" burgers made from elk and buffalo meat. They also offer several types of salads and have a menu for kids. Parking is great because there is a large parking structure located behind the restaurant. Prices are reasonable too. Love this place when I am in the mood for a burger.

data.title: Fuddruckers! Boy if you mix the letters up a bit???
data.text: I remember when this place first opened we were laughing over the mispronunciation of the Name on purpose! Then when we all got in there and were able to build our own gourmet Hamburgers we had a new outlook of what Fuddruckers was really all about. I have never left there Hungry. NEVER!

data.title: Quick bite, good lunch
data.text: We decided to grab a quick bite, a juicy burger with all the trimmings sounded like a good idea. Since time was short, Fuddruckers it was... A short line but moved quickly onward. It wasn't very long, burgers were done as asked for. Good decision, good meal! Got to do this again!

data.title: Old School Burger Shop
data.text: Conveniently located in the heart of downtown Chula Vista this old fashioned burger shop offers a delicious burger! Plenty of free parking out front makes the visit stress free. You will have choices on your burger size at your time of purchase along with numerous toppings...wide selection of cheeses, grilled mushrooms or onions. The burger,bun and fries are all made fresh to order. The restaurant itself looks like it hasn't gone through any type of renovation since the 80"s and even has a Pacman video machine! The dining area is extremely large and can accommodate both small and large groups. The food is fresh and prepared perfectly. The prices are great and portions are satisfying. Go and enjoy a burger and fries ... you'll be happy you did!

data.title: Burgers
data.text: I have visited this restaurant. There  burgers are the best in Chula Vista. I recommend this one because I really like this place.

data.title: Make it medium-rare
data.text: Convenient. Plenty of parking. Burger grilled to perfection. Able to build our own. Quiet during evening. Large portions.

data.title: FIVE STARS
data.text: Great place, it has excellent food, if you're looking for a place where you can eat a well-served burger, this is it, definitely best burger shop in Chula Vista. The place is rather cool, it has a nice decor, and the ambiance is super friendly.

data.title: First Time At This One (Outstanding)
data.text:
9/16/15
While visiting our son we went out for dinner. This is the first time we have been to this Fuddruckers. I must say this is one of the nicest we have been into around the Ca. and Az. Area. The place was very clean and the service was outstanding.

Emry & Virginia

data.title: Nice with family
data.text: Had a very good burger there! Toilets not clean. Very nice and helpful staff. The kids loved the fries and chicken stripes.

data.title: Yikes!
data.text: I don't know what happened to this place! We loved stopping here for a burger or salad 6 years ago. Nice people working there. Very friendly and helpful. But the food was not even appetizing. And the place is filthy. We are very disappointed to cross this one off our list. :(

data.title: Kids love it
data.text: Food is good and tastes homemade, but it is pricey.  Two adult meals and two children meals is about $40.00.  Grandsons love to go so we take them

data.title: Not A Very Good Fuddruckers
data.text: We live in Mexico, and so I was craving a US style burger for Father's Day.  The place is nice and the people that work there are friendly.  However, the food was not done very well.  I ordered my hamburger medium rare and it was well done.  My wife's hamburger had a burned bun on the inside which made it not very enjoyable.

data.title: Fun place for kids
data.text: They make good hamburgers and hotdogs - a large variety of things you can put on top.  Very kid friendly - so if you don't want to be around children you would be better off going somewhere else.

data.title: Love Fuddruckers, too bad it's hard to reach!
data.text:
we're from Europe. That's an important giving reading this. We've got McDo's, but even for Burger King you've got to go to another country...
So we don't have many burger-options, that's a fact. So chains like Fuddruckers were new to us when we visited the US in 2013. We loved it, the taste, the service, the decor, it was al superb.
When we roadtripped through Baja Mexico in 2014, we popped over the border for a day to San Diego. We really wanted to eat at Fuddruckers again. Imagine our surprise when we heard there wasn't a Fuddruckers anywhere near us (San Ysidro). So we went to the city center, again no fuddruckers...we had to go to one of the outer neighbourhoods of San Diego (La Mesa or in our case Chula Vista) to get to a Fuddruckers. This meant, getting on a train, taking a bus and walking another few miles. When you do this trip later in the evening, it's not so pleasant, we feel that those neighbourhoods weren't suitable to walk around safe... 
So: Fuddruckers: open a restaurant nearby the citycenter or the malls please :)
(and on your website, add a section "how to get here by public transport"
